name: Kevin Toms World Football Cup
description:
A fun and gripping Football World Cup based management game, that takes the 5 star rated Football Star* Manager game into the World Cup environment. Easy to play anywhere, no wifi necessary, it's also fast and customisable.
An unlimited number of scenarios keep the game enjoyable over time, and you can play as any national team you want, and with your favourite players.
7 skill levels to keep the challenge too. Can YOU win the World Football Cup on Level 7??
